PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both copolymers also exhibit distinct vibronic shoulder peaks at 710 nm which are derived from the coupling of the electronic and vibrational transition.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| distinct vibronic shoulder peaks |
| electronic and vibrational transition |

The two "Property Name" entities identified in the paragraph are "distinct vibronic shoulder peaks" and "electronic and vibrational transition." These entities are mentioned as properties of the copolymers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| distinct vibronic shoulder peaks |

The only valid "Material Property" entity identified in the paragraph is "distinct vibronic shoulder peaks." This is because it is the only entity that clearly refers to a property of the copolymers. The phrase "electronic and vibrational transition" is not a material property, but rather a physical process that gives rise to the distinct vibronic shoulder peaks.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both copolymers also exhibit distinct vibronic shoulder peaks at 710 nm which are derived from the coupling of the electronic and vibrational transition.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| distinct vibronic shoulder peaks |
| 710 nm |

Explanation:

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. "distinct vibronic shoulder peaks" - These are the peaks that are observed in the copolymers' spectrum, which are distinct and have a particular shape called a "shoulder peak."
2. "710 nm" - This is the wavelength at which the distinct vibronic shoulder peaks are observed. It is a numerical value that specifies the length of a wave in nanometers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 710 nm |

Explanation:

The only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to the "Value of material property" is:

1. "710 nm" - This is the wavelength at which the distinct vibronic shoulder peaks are observed. It is a numerical value that specifies the length of a wave in nanometers.

The other entity, "distinct vibronic shoulder peaks," is a descriptive term used to refer to a particular shape of peaks observed in the copolymers' spectrum, but it does not refer to a specific value of a material property.
